reviews.review: oyun güzel 2018de satın aldım çok güzel bi oyun tavsiye ederim
Игра хорошая, а вот комьюнити не очень)

Dagen då man har lyckats att finna lösningen att stoppa cheaters  kommer Csgo att blomma igen och självklarheten att cs är nr 1 igen! Att spelare är toxic kommer man aldrig ifrån, men att lyckas är att ignorera och inte sprida salt i såret och försöka att sträva mot vinst tillsammans är många som glömmer. Ut och panga och ha kul istället ! Peace out!

Very toxic community - most of my matches ends up that either someone from our team or other team abandones the match. 90% of matches are purely Russian speaking only, 5% Turkish and maybe 5% normal matches on English.

Setup normal servers for Western Europe - let us choose where to play ourselves. This matchmaking bullshit is nonsense.

Игра просто ужасная. Она не дает играть в саму себя, попадания просто не засчитываются. если кто то скажет играй фейсит
я скажу пошел нахуй почему я должен качать посторонюю программу для игры за которую деньги отдовал.

I'll always come back to my first love. 
cs in some form or another will always have a special place in my heart even if im stuck in silver hell. 

Id like to take a moment to share a few wise words shottysteve once sung

I think VAC doesn't stop hacks, that well
does that make me anti-vacc?

cause kqly never came back

But honestly, why do we,
come back after everything that we've seen,
I think its cause we're family,
disfunctional though it might seem.

Through backaches, and headshakes,
we've been through it all,
heartbreaks and mistakes,
the rise and the fall,

We're rushing B, but B is stacked,
The ninjas are down... but they'll come back,
we'll come back. we'll come back
we'll come back... we'll come back,
we'll come back...
